# `mise bin-paths`

- **Usage**: `mise bin-paths [TOOL@VERSION]…`
- **Source code**: [`src/cli/bin_paths.rs`](https://github.com/jdx/mise/blob/main/src/cli/bin_paths.rs)

List all the active runtime bin paths

## Arguments

### `[TOOL@VERSION]…`

Tool(s) to look up
e.g.: ruby@3
